Package pytils

Simple processing for russian strings
Submodules
  • dt: Russian dates without locales
  • numeral: Plural forms and in-word representation for numerals.
  • test: Unit tests for pytils
    • test_dt
    • test_numeral
    • test_translit
  • translit: Simple transliteration
